trans-unit.source: The SearchResultCollection class contains the <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.SearchResult"></xref> instances that the Active Directory hierarchy returned during a <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.DirectorySearcher"></xref> query.
trans-unit.target: A classe de SearchResultCollection contém o <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.SearchResult"> </xref> instâncias que hierarquia do Active Directory devolveu durante um <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.DirectorySearcher"> </xref> consulta.

trans-unit.source: Due to implementation restrictions, the SearchResultCollection class cannot release all of its unmanaged resources when it is garbage collected.
trans-unit.target: Devido a restrições de implementação, a classe de SearchResultCollection não é possível libertar todos os respetivos recursos não geridos quando este é memória libertada.

trans-unit.source: To prevent a memory leak, you must call the <xref:System.DirectoryServices.SearchResultCollection.Dispose%2A> method when the SearchResultCollection object is no longer needed.
trans-unit.target: Para evitar uma fuga de memória, tem de chamar o <xref:System.DirectoryServices.SearchResultCollection.Dispose%2A>método quando o objeto de SearchResultCollection já não é necessária.</xref:System.DirectoryServices.SearchResultCollection.Dispose%2A>

trans-unit.source: Determines if a specified <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.SearchResult"></xref> object is in this collection.
trans-unit.target: Determina se uma determinada <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.SearchResult"> </xref> objeto está nesta coleção.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.SearchResult"></xref> object to find.
trans-unit.target: O <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.SearchResult"> </xref> objeto localizar.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the specified property belongs to this collection; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Se a propriedade especificada pertence a esta coleção; caso contrário, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Copies all <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.SearchResult"></xref> objects in this collection to the specific array, starting at the specified index in the target array.
trans-unit.target: Copia todos os <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.SearchResult"> </xref> objetos nesta coleção para a matriz específica, que começa no índice especificado na matriz de destino.

trans-unit.source: The array of <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.SearchResult"></xref> objects that receives the elements of this collection.
trans-unit.target: A matriz de <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.SearchResult"> </xref> objetos que recebe os elementos desta coleção.

trans-unit.source: The zero-based index in `results` where this method starts copying this collection.
trans-unit.target: O índice baseado em zero `results` em que este método é iniciada copiar esta coleção.

trans-unit.source: Gets the number of <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.SearchResult"></xref> objects in this collection.
trans-unit.target: Obtém o número de <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.SearchResult"> </xref> objetos nesta coleção.

trans-unit.source: The number of <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.SearchResult"></xref> objects in this collection.
trans-unit.target: O número de <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.SearchResult"> </xref> objetos nesta coleção.

trans-unit.source: Releases all resources that are used by the <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.SearchResultCollection"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: Versões de todos os recursos que são utilizados pelo <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.SearchResultCollection"> </xref> objeto.

trans-unit.source: The Dispose method, it allows the resources that are used by the <xref:System.DirectoryServices.SearchResultCollection> to be reallocated for other purposes.
trans-unit.target: O método de Dispose, permite que os recursos que são utilizados pelo <xref:System.DirectoryServices.SearchResultCollection>para possível reatribuir porque para outros fins.</xref:System.DirectoryServices.SearchResultCollection>

trans-unit.source: For more information about Dispose, see [Cleaning Up Unmanaged Resources](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: Para obter mais informações sobre Dispose, consulte [recursos não geridos limpeza](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).

trans-unit.source: The garbage collector does not release memory for a <xref:System.DirectoryServices.SearchResultCollection> object.
trans-unit.target: O recoletor de lixo não libertar memória para um <xref:System.DirectoryServices.SearchResultCollection>objeto.</xref:System.DirectoryServices.SearchResultCollection>

trans-unit.source: Therefore, an application must call the Dispose method explicitly to prevent a memory leak.
trans-unit.target: Por conseguinte, uma aplicação tem de chamar o método de Dispose explicitamente para impedir a fuga de memória.

trans-unit.source: Releases the unmanaged resources that are used by the <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.SearchResultCollection"></xref> object and optionally releases the managed resources.
trans-unit.target: Liberta os recursos não geridos que são utilizados pelo <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.SearchResultCollection"> </xref> objeto e, opcionalmente, liberta os recursos geridos.

trans-unit.source: This method is called by the public <xref:System.DirectoryServices.SearchResultCollection.Dispose%2A> method and the <xref:System.Object.Finalize%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: Este método é denominado pelo público <xref:System.DirectoryServices.SearchResultCollection.Dispose%2A>método e o <xref:System.Object.Finalize%2A>método.</xref:System.Object.Finalize%2A> </xref:System.DirectoryServices.SearchResultCollection.Dispose%2A>

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.DirectoryServices.SearchResultCollection.Dispose%2A> invokes the protected Dispose method with the `disposing` parameter set to `true`.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.DirectoryServices.SearchResultCollection.Dispose%2A>Invoca o método de Dispose protegido com o `disposing` parâmetro definido como `true`.</xref:System.DirectoryServices.SearchResultCollection.Dispose%2A>

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Object.Finalize%2A> invokes Dispose with the `disposing` parameter set to `false`.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Object.Finalize%2A>invoca Dispose com o `disposing` parâmetro definido como `false`.</xref:System.Object.Finalize%2A>

trans-unit.source: When the `disposing` parameter is `true`, this method releases all resources that are held by any managed objects that this <xref:System.DirectoryServices.SearchResultCollection> references.
trans-unit.target: Quando o `disposing` parâmetro é `true`, este método versões todos os recursos que são detidos por quaisquer objetos geridos que este <xref:System.DirectoryServices.SearchResultCollection>referências.</xref:System.DirectoryServices.SearchResultCollection>

trans-unit.source: The garbage collector does not release memory for a <xref:System.DirectoryServices.SearchResultCollection> object.
trans-unit.target: O recoletor de lixo não libertar memória para um <xref:System.DirectoryServices.SearchResultCollection>objeto.</xref:System.DirectoryServices.SearchResultCollection>

trans-unit.source: Therefore, you must call the <xref:System.DirectoryServices.SearchResultCollection.Dispose%2A> method explicitly to prevent a memory leak.
trans-unit.target: Por conseguinte, tem de chamar o <xref:System.DirectoryServices.SearchResultCollection.Dispose%2A>método explicitamente para impedir a fuga de memória.</xref:System.DirectoryServices.SearchResultCollection.Dispose%2A>

trans-unit.source: This method invokes the <xref:System.DirectoryServices.SearchResultCollection.Dispose%2A> method of each object in the collection.
trans-unit.target: Este método invoca o <xref:System.DirectoryServices.SearchResultCollection.Dispose%2A>método de cada objeto na coleção.</xref:System.DirectoryServices.SearchResultCollection.Dispose%2A>

trans-unit.source: For more information about <xref:System.DirectoryServices.SearchResultCollection.Dispose> and <xref:System.Object.Finalize%2A>, see [Cleaning Up Unmanaged Resources](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md) and [Overriding the Finalize Method](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/8026cb68-fe93-43fc-96c1-c09ad7d64cd3).
trans-unit.target: Para obter mais informações sobre <xref:System.DirectoryServices.SearchResultCollection.Dispose>e <xref:System.Object.Finalize%2A>, consulte [recursos não geridos limpeza](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md) e [a substituir o método Finalize](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/8026cb68-fe93-43fc-96c1-c09ad7d64cd3).</xref:System.Object.Finalize%2A> </xref:System.DirectoryServices.SearchResultCollection.Dispose>

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> to release both managed and unmanaged resources; <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref> to release only unmanaged resources.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Para libertar recursos geridos e; <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref> para libertar recursos apenas não geridos.

trans-unit.source: Overrides the <xref:System.Object.Finalize%2A?displayProperty=fullName> method.
trans-unit.target: Substitui o <xref:System.Object.Finalize%2A?displayProperty=fullName> método.

trans-unit.source: Returns an enumerator that you can use to iterate through this collection.
trans-unit.target: Devolve um enumerador que pode utilizar para iterar através desta coleção.

trans-unit.source: An <xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator> object that you can use to iterate through this collection.
trans-unit.target: Um <xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator>objeto que pode utilizar para iterar através desta coleção.</xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator>

trans-unit.source: Gets the handle that is returned by the [IDirectorySearch::ExecuteSearch](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/default.asp?url=/library/adsi/adsi/idirectorysearch_executesearch.asp) method that performs the actual search.
trans-unit.target: Obtém o identificador que é devolvido pelo [IDirectorySearch::ExecuteSearch](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/default.asp?url=/library/adsi/adsi/idirectorysearch_executesearch.asp) método que executa a pesquisa real.

trans-unit.source: For more information, see the [IDirectorySearch::ExecuteSearch](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/default.asp?url=/library/adsi/adsi/idirectorysearch_executesearch.asp) topic in the MSDN Library at [http://msdn.microsoft.com/library](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library).
trans-unit.target: Para obter mais informações, consulte o [IDirectorySearch::ExecuteSearch](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/default.asp?url=/library/adsi/adsi/idirectorysearch_executesearch.asp) tópico da biblioteca do MSDN em [http://msdn.microsoft.com/library](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library).

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.DirectoryServices.DirectorySearcher> that created this collection calls the [IDirectorySearch::ExecuteSearch](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/default.asp?url=/library/adsi/adsi/idirectorysearch_executesearch.asp) method, which makes the query results available to the T:System.DirectoryServices.SearchResultCollection object.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.DirectoryServices.DirectorySearcher>que criou esta coleção chama o [IDirectorySearch::ExecuteSearch](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/default.asp?url=/library/adsi/adsi/idirectorysearch_executesearch.asp) método, o que disponibiliza os resultados da consulta para o objeto de T:System.DirectoryServices.SearchResultCollection.</xref:System.DirectoryServices.DirectorySearcher>

trans-unit.source: For more information, see the [IDirectorySearch::ExecuteSearch](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/default.asp?url=/library/adsi/adsi/idirectorysearch_executesearch.asp) topic in the MSDN Library at [http://msdn.microsoft.com/library](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library).
trans-unit.target: Para obter mais informações, consulte o [IDirectorySearch::ExecuteSearch](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/default.asp?url=/library/adsi/adsi/idirectorysearch_executesearch.asp) tópico da biblioteca do MSDN em [http://msdn.microsoft.com/library](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library).

trans-unit.source: Each time that a query is performed, a handle for the results of that query is associated with its <xref:System.DirectoryServices.SearchResultCollection> object.
trans-unit.target: Sempre que uma consulta é executada, um identificador para os resultados da consulta de que está associada à respetiva <xref:System.DirectoryServices.SearchResultCollection>objeto.</xref:System.DirectoryServices.SearchResultCollection>

trans-unit.source: This handle corresponds to the search handle in ADSI.
trans-unit.target: Este identificador corresponde ao identificador de pesquisa no Editor de ADSI.

trans-unit.source: This handle persists until you call the <xref:System.DirectoryServices.SearchResultCollection.Dispose> method on the <xref:System.DirectoryServices.SearchResultCollection> object, so you must call <xref:System.DirectoryServices.SearchResultCollection.Dispose> to prevent a memory leak.
trans-unit.target: Este identificador persiste até tem de chamar o <xref:System.DirectoryServices.SearchResultCollection.Dispose>método no <xref:System.DirectoryServices.SearchResultCollection>objeto, pelo que tem de chamar <xref:System.DirectoryServices.SearchResultCollection.Dispose>para impedir a fuga de memória.</xref:System.DirectoryServices.SearchResultCollection.Dispose> </xref:System.DirectoryServices.SearchResultCollection> </xref:System.DirectoryServices.SearchResultCollection.Dispose>

trans-unit.source: The garbage collector does not free memory for this particular object.
trans-unit.target: O recoletor de lixo libertar memória para este objeto específico.

trans-unit.source: The ADS_SEARCH_HANDLE value that this collection uses.
trans-unit.target: O valor ADS_SEARCH_HANDLE que utiliza esta coleção.

trans-unit.source: Returns the index of the first occurrence of the specified <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.SearchResult"></xref> object in this collection.
trans-unit.target: Devolve o índice da primeira ocorrência de especificado <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.SearchResult"> </xref> objeto nesta coleção.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.SearchResult"></xref> object to search for in this collection.
trans-unit.target: O <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.SearchResult"> </xref> objeto para procurar nesta coleção.

trans-unit.source: The zero-based index of the first matching object.
trans-unit.target: O índice baseado em zero do objeto correspondente primeiro.

trans-unit.source: Returns -1 if no member of this collection is identical to the <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.SearchResult"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: Devolve -1 se não existem membros desta coleção são idêntico para os <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.SearchResult"> </xref> objeto.

trans-unit.source: Gets the <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.SearchResult"></xref> object that is located at a specified index in this collection.
trans-unit.target: Obtém o <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.SearchResult"> </xref> objeto que está localizado num índice especificado nesta coleção.

trans-unit.source: In C#, this property is the indexer for the <xref:System.DirectoryServices.SearchResultCollection> class.
trans-unit.target: Em c#, esta propriedade é o indexador para a <xref:System.DirectoryServices.SearchResultCollection>classe.</xref:System.DirectoryServices.SearchResultCollection>

trans-unit.source: In JScript, you can use the default indexed properties defined by a type, but you cannot explicitly define your own.
trans-unit.target: No JScript, pode utilizar as propriedades de predefinição indexada definidas por um tipo, mas não é possível definir explicitamente as suas próprias.

trans-unit.source: However, specifying the expando attribute on a class automatically provides a default indexed property whose type is Object and with an index type of <xref:System.String>.
trans-unit.target: No entanto, especificar o atributo expando numa classe disponibiliza automaticamente um predefinido indexada propriedade cujo tipo seja objeto e com um tipo de índice de <xref:System.String>.</xref:System.String>

trans-unit.source: The zero-based index of the <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.SearchResult"></xref> object to retrieve.
trans-unit.target: O índice baseado em zero do <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.SearchResult"> </xref> o objeto a obter.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.SearchResult"></xref> object that is located at the specified index.
trans-unit.target: O <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.SearchResult"> </xref> objeto que está localizado no índice especificado.

trans-unit.source: Gets the <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.DirectorySearcher"></xref> properties that were specified before the search was executed.
trans-unit.target: Obtém o <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.DirectorySearcher"> </xref> propriedades que foram especificadas antes da pesquisa foi executada.

trans-unit.source: An array of type <xref:System.String> that contains the properties that were specified in the <xref:System.DirectoryServices.DirectorySearcher.PropertiesToLoad*> property collection before the search was executed.
trans-unit.target: Uma matriz do tipo <xref:System.String>que contém as propriedades que foram especificadas no <xref:System.DirectoryServices.DirectorySearcher.PropertiesToLoad*>coleção de propriedade antes da pesquisa foi executada.</xref:System.DirectoryServices.DirectorySearcher.PropertiesToLoad*> </xref:System.String>

trans-unit.source: Copies the elements of the <xref:System.Collections.ICollection> to an <xref:System.Array>, starting at a particular <xref:System.Array> index.
trans-unit.target: Copia os elementos do <xref:System.Collections.ICollection>para um <xref:System.Array>, começando num determinado <xref:System.Array>índice.</xref:System.Array> </xref:System.Array> </xref:System.Collections.ICollection>

trans-unit.source: The one-dimensional <xref:System.Array> that is the destination of the elements copied from <xref:System.Collections.ICollection>.
trans-unit.target: Unidimensional <xref:System.Array>que é o destino dos elementos copiados <xref:System.Collections.ICollection>.</xref:System.Collections.ICollection> </xref:System.Array>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Array> must have zero-based indexing.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Array>tem de ter a indexação com base em zero.</xref:System.Array>

trans-unit.source: The zero-based index in `array` at which copying begins.
trans-unit.target: O índice baseado em zero `array` em que copiar começa.

trans-unit.source: array is .
trans-unit.target: arrayis .

trans-unit.source: index is less than zero.
trans-unit.target: indexé menor que zero.

trans-unit.source: array is multidimensional.
trans-unit.target: arrayé multidimensional.

trans-unit.source: -or- The number of elements in the source is greater than the available space from index to the end of the destination array.
trans-unit.target: - ou - o número de elementos na origem de é superior ao espaço disponível desde o index ao fim do destino array.

trans-unit.source: The type of the source cannot be cast automatically to the type of the destination array.
trans-unit.target: O tipo da origem de não pode ser convertido automaticamente para o tipo de destino array .

trans-unit.source: Gets a value indicating whether access to the <xref:System.Collections.ICollection> is synchronized (thread safe).
trans-unit.target: Obtém um valor que indica se o acesso à <xref:System.Collections.ICollection>é sincronizado (seguros para threads).</xref:System.Collections.ICollection>

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Collections.ICollection.SyncRoot%2A> returns an object, which can be used to synchronize access to the <xref:System.Collections.ICollection>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Collections.ICollection.SyncRoot%2A>Devolve um objeto, que pode ser utilizado para sincronizar o acesso ao <xref:System.Collections.ICollection>.</xref:System.Collections.ICollection></xref:System.Collections.ICollection.SyncRoot%2A>

trans-unit.source: Most collection classes in the <xref:System.Collections?displayProperty=fullName> namespace also implement a Synchronized method, which provides a synchronized wrapper around the underlying collection.
trans-unit.target: Coleção a maioria das classes no <xref:System.Collections?displayProperty=fullName>espaço de nomes também implementar um método sincronizado, que fornece um papel de embrulho à volta a colecção subjacente sincronizado.</xref:System.Collections?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: Enumerating through a collection is intrinsically not a thread safe procedure.
trans-unit.target: Enumerar através de uma coleção intrinsecamente não é um procedimento de segurança de thread.

trans-unit.source: Even when a collection is synchronized, other threads can still modify the collection, which causes the enumerator to throw an exception.
trans-unit.target: Mesmo quando uma coleção está sincronizada, outros threads ainda podem modificar a coleção, o que faz com que o enumerador acionar uma excepção.

trans-unit.source: To guarantee thread safety during enumeration, you can either lock the collection during the entire enumeration or catch the exceptions resulting from changes made by other threads.
trans-unit.target: Para garantir a segurança de thread durante a enumeração, pode bloquear a coleção durante a enumeração de toda ou detetar exceções resultantes das alterações efetuadas por outros threads.

trans-unit.source: [Visual Basic, C#] The following code example shows how to lock the collection using the <xref:System.Collections.ICollection.SyncRoot%2A> during the entire enumeration: ```c# ICollection myCollection = new ICollection(); lock(myCollection.SyncRoot) { foreach (Object item in myCollection) { // Insert your code here. } } ``` ```vb# Dim myCollection As New ICollection() Dim item As Object SyncLock myCollection.SyncRoot For Each item In myCollection ' Insert your code here. Next item End SyncLock ```
trans-unit.target: [Visual Basic, c#] Exemplo de código seguinte mostra como utilizar a coleção de bloqueio de <xref:System.Collections.ICollection.SyncRoot%2A>durante a enumeração toda: ```c# ICollection myCollection = new ICollection(); lock(myCollection.SyncRoot) { foreach (Object item in myCollection) { // Insert your code here. } } ``` ```vb# Dim myCollection As New ICollection() Dim item As Object SyncLock myCollection.SyncRoot For Each item In myCollection ' Insert your code here. Next item End SyncLock ``` </xref:System.Collections.ICollection.SyncRoot%2A>

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if access to the <xref:System.Collections.ICollection> is synchronized (thread safe); otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Se o acesso à <xref:System.Collections.ICollection>é sincronizado (seguros para threads); caso contrário, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.</xref:System.Collections.ICollection>

trans-unit.source: Gets an object that can be used to synchronize access to the <xref:System.Collections.ICollection>.
trans-unit.target: Obtém um objeto que pode ser utilizado para sincronizar o acesso ao <xref:System.Collections.ICollection>.</xref:System.Collections.ICollection>

trans-unit.source: For collections whose underlying store is not publicly available, the expected implementation is to return the current instance.
trans-unit.target: Para coleções cujo arquivo subjacente não é publicamente disponível, a implementação esperada é devolver a instância atual.

trans-unit.source: Note that the pointer to the current instance might not be sufficient for collections that wrap other collections; those should return the underlying collection's `SyncRoot` property.
trans-unit.target: Tenha em atenção que o apontador para a instância atual poderá não ser suficiente para coleções que moldam outras coleções; os deverá devolver a colecção subjacente `SyncRoot` propriedade.

trans-unit.source: Most collection classes in the <xref:System.Collections?displayProperty=fullName> namespace also implement a `Synchronized` method, which provides a synchronized wrapper around the underlying collection.
trans-unit.target: Coleção a maioria das classes no <xref:System.Collections?displayProperty=fullName>espaço de nomes também implementar um `Synchronized` método, o que fornece um papel de embrulho à volta a colecção subjacente sincronizado.</xref:System.Collections?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: However, derived classes can provide their own synchronized version of the collection using the <xref:System.Collections.ICollection.SyncRoot%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: No entanto, as classes derivadas podem fornecer os seus próprios versão sincronizado da utilização de coleção a <xref:System.Collections.ICollection.SyncRoot%2A>propriedade.</xref:System.Collections.ICollection.SyncRoot%2A>

trans-unit.source: The synchronizing code must perform operations on the <xref:System.Collections.ICollection.SyncRoot%2A> of the collection, not directly on the collection.
trans-unit.target: O código de sincronização tem de efetuar operações no <xref:System.Collections.ICollection.SyncRoot%2A>da coleção, não diretamente na coleção.</xref:System.Collections.ICollection.SyncRoot%2A>

trans-unit.source: This ensures proper operation of collections that are derived from other objects.
trans-unit.target: Isto assegura um funcionamento correto de coleções que são derivadas de outros objetos.

trans-unit.source: Specifically, it maintains proper synchronization with other threads that might be simultaneously modifying the collection instance.
trans-unit.target: Especificamente, mantém a sincronização adequada com outros threads que podem ser simultaneamente modificar a instância de coleção.

trans-unit.source: In the absence of a `Synchronized` method on a collection, the expected usage for <xref:System.Collections.ICollection.SyncRoot%2A> looks like this: ```c# ICollection MyCollection =... lock(MyCollection.SyncRoot) { // Some operation on the collection, which is now thread safe. } ``` [Visual Basic] ``` Dim myCollection as New ICollection() SyncLock myCollection.SyncRoot ' Some operation on the collection, which is now thread safe. End SyncLock ``` Enumerating through a collection is intrinsically not a thread safe procedure.
trans-unit.target: Na ausência de um `Synchronized` método numa coleção, a utilização esperada para <xref:System.Collections.ICollection.SyncRoot%2A>se parece com isto: ```c# ICollection MyCollection =... lock(MyCollection.SyncRoot) { // Some operation on the collection, which is now thread safe. } ``` [Visual Basic] ``` Dim myCollection as New ICollection() SyncLock myCollection.SyncRoot ' Some operation on the collection, which is now thread safe. End SyncLock ``` enumerar através de uma coleção intrinsecamente não é um procedimento de segurança de thread.</xref:System.Collections.ICollection.SyncRoot%2A>

trans-unit.source: Even when a collection is synchronized, other threads can still modify the collection, which causes the enumerator to throw an exception.
trans-unit.target: Mesmo quando uma coleção está sincronizada, outros threads ainda podem modificar a coleção, o que faz com que o enumerador acionar uma excepção.

trans-unit.source: To guarantee thread safety during enumeration, you can either lock the collection during the entire enumeration or catch the exceptions resulting from changes made by other threads.
trans-unit.target: Para garantir a segurança de thread durante a enumeração, pode bloquear a coleção durante a enumeração de toda ou detetar exceções resultantes das alterações efetuadas por outros threads.

trans-unit.source: [Visual Basic, C#] The following code example shows how to lock the collection using the <xref:System.Collections.ICollection.SyncRoot%2A> during the entire enumeration: ```c# ICollection myCollection = new ICollection(); lock(myCollection.SyncRoot) { foreach (Object item in myCollection) { // Insert your code here. } } ``` ```vb# Dim myCollection As New ICollection() Dim item As Object SyncLock myCollection.SyncRoot For Each item In myCollection ' Insert your code here. Next item End SyncLock ```
trans-unit.target: [Visual Basic, c#] Exemplo de código seguinte mostra como utilizar a coleção de bloqueio de <xref:System.Collections.ICollection.SyncRoot%2A>durante a enumeração toda: ```c# ICollection myCollection = new ICollection(); lock(myCollection.SyncRoot) { foreach (Object item in myCollection) { // Insert your code here. } } ``` ```vb# Dim myCollection As New ICollection() Dim item As Object SyncLock myCollection.SyncRoot For Each item In myCollection ' Insert your code here. Next item End SyncLock ``` </xref:System.Collections.ICollection.SyncRoot%2A>

trans-unit.source: An object that can be used to synchronize access to the <xref:System.Collections.ICollection>.
trans-unit.target: Um objeto que pode ser utilizado para sincronizar o acesso ao <xref:System.Collections.ICollection>.</xref:System.Collections.ICollection>
